AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Additional Paid in Capital
AdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

AmortizationOfDeferredSalesCommissions.label: Amortization of Deferred Sales Commissions
AmortizationOfDeferredSalesCommissions.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period for the periodic realization of capitalized fees that were paid to salespeople, distributors, brokers, and agents at the time of the conclusion of the sale. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AmortizationOfPowerContractsEmissionCred.label: Amortization of Power Contracts Emission Credits
AmortizationOfPowerContractsEmissionCred.description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of capitalized costs related to purchasing power, fuel, or emission credits. These items may be purchased in one accounting period but are deducted from earnings over time through amortization.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CumulativeEarningsDeficit.label: Cumulative Earnings (Deficit)
CumulativeEarningsDeficit.description: Amount of cumulative earnings (deficits) for relevant time periods.

DeferredOfferingCosts.label: Deferred Offering Costs
DeferredOfferingCosts.description: Specific incremental costs directly attributable to a proposed or actual offering of securities which are deferred at the end of the reporting period.

Deposits.label: Deposits
Deposits.description: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.label: Excess Stock, Shares Outstanding
ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of excess stock held by shareholders.

ExpenseRelatedToDistributionOrServicingA.label: Expense Related to Distribution or Servicing and Underwriting Fees
ExpenseRelatedToDistributionOrServicingA.description: Expense related to distribution, servicing and underwriting fees.

GeneralPartnersOfferingCosts.label: General Partners' Offering Costs
GeneralPartnersOfferingCosts.description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the general partner.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.

InvestmentsAndCash.label: Investments and Cash
InvestmentsAndCash.description: Sum of investments and unrestricted cash as of the balance sheet date.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LimitedPartnersOfferingCosts.label: Limited Partners' Offering Costs
LimitedPartnersOfferingCosts.description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the limited partners.

LitigationSettlementExpense.label: Litigation Settlement, Expense
LitigationSettlementExpense.description: Amount of litigation expense, including but not limited to legal, forensic, accounting, and investigative fees.

LoansPayableCurrent.label: Loans Payable, Current
LoansPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

OperatingCostsAndExpenses.label: Operating Costs and Expenses
OperatingCostsAndExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Treasury Units Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PaymentsForCommissions.label: Payments for Commissions
PaymentsForCommissions.description: The amount of cash paid for commissions during the current period.

PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense.label: Payments for Underwriting Expense
PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense.description: Cash paid for expenses incurred during underwriting activities (the process to review insurance applications, evaluate risks, accept or reject applications, and determine the premiums to be charged) for insurance companies.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueAmount.label: Servicing Liability at Fair Value, Amount
ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueAmount.description: Fair value of a liability representing servicing arrangements under which the estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.

SponsorFees.label: Sponsor Fees
SponsorFees.description: Fees paid to advisors who provide certain management support and administrative oversight services including the organization and sale of stock, investment funds, limited partnerships and mutual funds.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AccruedUtilitiesCurrent.label: Accrued Utilities, Current
AccruedUtilitiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for utilities, such as electrical power, heating oil, natural gas, and water. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalOthe.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Other
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalOthe.description: Amount of other increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC).

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarr.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Warrant Issued
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarr.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from the issuance of warrants. Includes allocation of proceeds of debt securities issued with detachable stock purchase warrants.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsHeldInTrust.label: Assets Held-in-trust
AssetsHeldInTrust.description: The total amount of cash and securities held by third party trustees pursuant to terms of debt instruments or other agreements as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, which can be used by the trustee only to pay the noncurrent portion of specified obligations.

AssetsHeldInTrustCurrent.label: Assets Held-in-trust, Current
AssetsHeldInTrustCurrent.description: The amount of cash, securities, or other assets held by a third-party trustee pursuant to the terms of an agreement which assets are available to be used by beneficiaries to that agreement only within the specific terms thereof and which agreement is expected to terminate within one year of the balance sheet date (or operating cycle, if longer) at which time the assets held-in-trust will be released or forfeited.

AssetsHeldInTrustNoncurrent.label: Assets Held-in-trust, Noncurrent
AssetsHeldInTrustNoncurrent.description: The amount of cash, securities, or other assets held by a third-party trustee pursuant to the terms of an agreement which assets are available to be used by beneficiaries to that agreement only within the specific terms thereof and which agreement is expected to terminate more than one year from the balance sheet date (or operating cycle, if longer) at which time the assets held-in-trust will be released or forfeited.

CashAcquiredFromAcquisition.label: Cash Acquired from Acquisition
CashAcquiredFromAcquisition.description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period (for example, cash that was held by the acquired business).

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

DeferredCompensationLiabilityCurrent.label: Deferred Compensation Liability, Current
DeferredCompensationLiabilityCurrent.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under compensation arrangements that is not actually paid until a later date.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPFairValueO.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Fair Value of Shares Subject to Repurchase Obligation
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPFairValueO.description: Fair value of the shares allocated that are subject to a repurchase obligation.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidExpense.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidExpense.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of outstanding money paid in advance for goods or services that bring economic benefits for future periods.

InterestIncomeSecuritiesOtherUSGovernmen.label: Interest Income, Securities, Other US Government
InterestIncomeSecuritiesOtherUSGovernmen.description: Interest income on securities issued by US government agencies not including US Treasury Securities.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units Net of Offering Costs
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering, net of offering costs. This is a parenthetical disclosure.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfInitialPublicOffe.label: Payments for Repurchase of Initial Public Offering
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfInitialPublicOffe.description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.label: Payments to Acquire Assets, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.label: Proceeds from Issuance Initial Public Offering
ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsInv.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds, Investing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsInv.description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Exercised
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of non-option equity instruments exercised by participants.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number of shares (or other type of equity) forfeited during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Value of accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value during the period.

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value, Adjustment
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Attributable to Parent
TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityNetIncome.label: Temporary Equity, Net Income
TemporaryEquityNetIncome.description: The portion of net income or loss attributable to temporary equity interest.

TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.label: Travel and Entertainment Expense
TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.description: Expenses incurred for travel and entertainment during the period.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

DueToAffiliateCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Affiliate
DueToAffiliateCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

PartnersCapitalDistributionAmountPerShar.label: Partners' Capital, Distribution Amount Per Share
PartnersCapitalDistributionAmountPerShar.description: The distribution amount per share for all classes of units.

AccruedExchangeFeeRebateCurrentAndNoncur.label: Accrued Exchange Fee Rebate
AccruedExchangeFeeRebateCurrentAndNoncur.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for rebates of an exchange fee some mutual funds impose on shareholders if they exchange (transfer) to another fund within the same fund group.

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.description: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Cash Award Granted, Amount
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.description: Amount of commitment made to pay deferred cash remuneration.

DerivativeCashReceivedOnHedge.label: Derivative, Cash Received on Hedge
DerivativeCashReceivedOnHedge.description: The amount of cash received during the period on settlement of a hedge.

FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.label: Financing Receivable, Unamortized Loan Fee (Cost)
FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.description: Amount of unamortized loan commitment, origination, and other fees (costs) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.label: Investment Owned, at Fair Value
InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.description: Value of the investment at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, the value would be aggregated by category. For investment in and advances to affiliates, if operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates within divisions and by type of activities.

OtherCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Other Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
OtherCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates, classified as other. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

RetainageDeposit.label: Retainage Deposit
RetainageDeposit.description: The amount of assets, typically cash, provided to suppliers of goods in advance of receipt and acceptance, or services (such as research facilities, lawyers or consultants), which is held by such parties until the entity either effects full payment (including applying the retainer) or obtains release from liability.

RetentionPayable.label: Retention Payable
RetentionPayable.description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

RetentionPayableDueAfterRollingYearFive.label: Retention Payable, Due after Rolling Year Five
RetentionPayableDueAfterRollingYearFive.description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStoc.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Stock Split
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStoc.description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a stock split in which per-share par value or stated value is not changed proportionately.

CostsAndExpensesRelatedParty.label: Costs and Expenses, Related Party
CostsAndExpensesRelatedParty.description: Costs of sales and operating expenses for the period incurred from transactions with related parties.

FairValueOptionAggregateDifferencesLongT.label: Fair Value, Option, Aggregate Differences, Long-term Debt Instruments
FairValueOptionAggregateDifferencesLongT.description: This item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of long-term debt instruments that have contractual principal amounts and for which the fair value option has been elected.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), Unrealized
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

IncreaseDecreaseDueFromAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) Due from Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseDueFromAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInConstructionPayables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Construction Payables
IncreaseDecreaseInConstructionPayables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of obligations, not classified as trade payables, incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies, and services pertaining to construction projects.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

PaymentForAdministrativeFees.label: Payment for Administrative Fees
PaymentForAdministrativeFees.description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) for administrative services provided to the LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or overhead costs.

PaymentsForFees.label: Payments for Other Fees
PaymentsForFees.description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PrincipalTransactionsRevenue.label: Principal Transactions Revenue, Net
PrincipalTransactionsRevenue.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) resulting from the difference between acquisition price and selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, and from the firm's direct investment activity, conducted separately from customer trading activities, including, but not limited to, investments in private equity, alternative investment products, real estate, and exchanges and memberships.

RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.label: Related Party Transaction, Selling, General and Administrative Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Purchase Price of Common Stock, Percent
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

TransferMortgagePayable.label: Transfer Mortgage Payable
TransferMortgagePayable.description: The fair value of transfer of mortgage payable in noncash investing or financing activities.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.
